title: Electric scooters may get costlier as FAME incentives taper off: Crisil
description: The brisk adoption of EVs is likely to continue now due to better cost economics, availability of multiple models, and feasibility of home-charging options. The sentiment reflects in the quick turnover of e-two wheeler companies.
